name: The Adventures of Fredman Jones
description:
(VULGAR LANGUAGE WARNING) (HTML VERSION BEST PLAYED IN CHROME)

Welcome to the world of Fredman!

The Adventures of Fredman Jones is a 2D side-scrolling platformer where you play as the... thing known as Fredman Jones, trying to get his car keys back after they were stolen. To get them back, Fredman must travel through 5 levels, shoulder-bashing, stomping, and suffering all along the way.

What is a Fredman Jones made of?
  • 7 levels. 5 main, 1 bonus, and the tutorial.
  • 4 useful powers to collect, with all 4 being upgraded if you get a perfect rank.
  • A sense of humor straight out of a shitpost, vulgar language included.
  • Two bonus mini-games unlocked after beating the game.
  • A wide range of difficulty options.
  • 3 save slots.
  • Plenty of secrets to discover.
  • and who could forget Reginald...
Who made this abomination?

It was me, Krick!

Everything from the graphics, to the programming, to the music, and even the characters, all made by me. Development started back in mid December of 2021, and rather unfortunately, this project has been hit with the dreaded burn-out! To combat this, rather than letting it rot away, I'm letting people still play it! If you catch any bugs nobody else did... ABSOLUTELY TELL ME RIGHT AWAY!

Why should I play?

Fredman can't do this alone...
